title: Planetbase

notes: Graphics look decent through intro, but lack of text on almost all dialogs makes the game unplayable.  When you start some text is visible but I believe these are button graphics.  Quick way to check fonts are to go into settings, then configure buttons.

title: Planetbase

cpu: AMD Ryzen 5 PRO 2500U w/ Radeon Vega Mobile Gfx
notes:
Issues:
In game texts are not displayed

Fix:
Install windows core fonts inside planetbase game prefix

Steps:

#Go to home folder
cd ~

#Download winetricks
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Winetricks/winetricks/master/src/winetricks

#Grant execution privileges
chmod +x winetricks

#Run winetricks with correct wineserver and wineprefix (planetbase game id)
WINESERVER="/home/username/.steam/steam/steamapps/common/Proton 3.16/dist/bin/wineserver" WINEPREFIX="/home/username/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/403190/pfx/" ./winetricks corefonts
title: Planetbase

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.0-2-amd64, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Issue: crash at startup. To make it running, give "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" in the launch options. I also have installed corefonts though winetricks.
title: Planetbase

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Haswell Mobile
notes: Installed corefonts as described in https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/307#issuecomment-416514188 - text is displayed, the game runs smoothly, looking slightly redder than it should
title: Planetbase

notes: Installed Core Fonts via Winetricks (see other reports for great instructions).  Text appears, game runs quite well.
title: Planetbase
